<p>title: Pythonç±»å‹æç¤ºå®Œå…¨æŒ‡å—ï¼šç”¨ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨é‡æ„ä½ çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œæå‡10å€å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡<br>
date: 2025/2/23<br>
updated: 2025/2/23<br>
author: <a href="https://cmdragon.cn" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"> cmdragon </a></p>
<p>excerpt:<br>
ä½ å°†æŒæ¡ï¼šç±»å‹æ³¨è§£çš„7ç§é«˜çº§å†™æ³•ï¼ˆå«æ³›å‹/åµŒå¥—ç±»å‹/å¼‚æ­¥ç±»å‹ï¼‰Pydanticä¸FastAPIçš„æ·±åº¦ç±»å‹é›†æˆæŠ€å·§10ä¸ªå¸¸è§ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯çš„è¯Šæ–­ä¸ä¿®å¤æ–¹æ¡ˆç±»å‹é©±åŠ¨å¼€å‘ï¼ˆTDDï¼‰åœ¨å¤§å‹é¡¹ç›®ä¸­çš„è½åœ°å®è·µ</p>

<li>Mypyå®æˆ˜</li>
<li>ä»£ç å¥å£®æ€§</li>

<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1546022/202502/1546022-20250223165932083-1170834453.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"><br>

<p>æ‰«æ<a href="https://static.amd794.com/blog/images/cmdragon_cn.png" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">äºŒç»´ç </a>å…³æ³¨æˆ–è€…å¾®ä¿¡æœä¸€æœï¼š<code>ç¼–ç¨‹æ™ºåŸŸ å‰ç«¯è‡³å…¨æ ˆäº¤æµä¸æˆé•¿</code></p>
<p>ğŸ”¥ æ·±å…¥è§£æç±»å‹ç³»ç»Ÿçš„åº•å±‚åŸç†ä¸å·¥ç¨‹å®è·µã€‚ä½ å°†æŒæ¡ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>ç±»å‹æ³¨è§£çš„7ç§é«˜çº§å†™æ³•ï¼ˆå«æ³›å‹/åµŒå¥—ç±»å‹/å¼‚æ­¥ç±»å‹ï¼‰</li>
<li>Pydanticä¸FastAPIçš„æ·±åº¦ç±»å‹é›†æˆæŠ€å·§</li>
<li>10ä¸ªå¸¸è§ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯çš„è¯Šæ–­ä¸ä¿®å¤æ–¹æ¡ˆ</li>
<li>ç±»å‹é©±åŠ¨å¼€å‘ï¼ˆTDDï¼‰åœ¨å¤§å‹é¡¹ç›®ä¸­çš„è½åœ°å®è·µ</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="-ç¬¬ä¸€ç« ç±»å‹é©å‘½ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä½ çš„ä»£ç éœ€è¦ç±»å‹æç¤º">ğŸš€ ç¬¬ä¸€ç« ï¼šç±»å‹é©å‘½â€”â€”ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä½ çš„ä»£ç éœ€è¦ç±»å‹æç¤ºï¼Ÿ</h4>
<p><strong>1.1 ä»è¡€æ³ªæ¡ˆä¾‹çœ‹åŠ¨æ€ç±»å‹é™·é˜±</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python"># çº¿ä¸Šäº‹æ•…å¤ç›˜ï¼šç±»å‹é”™è¯¯å¯¼è‡´çš„æ•°æ®æ±¡æŸ“  
def calculate_tax(income):  
    return income * 0.2 + 500  

# è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ä¼ å…¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‚æ•°  
print(calculate_tax("100000"))  # è¿”å›"100000000.0"ï¼Œé™é»˜é”™è¯¯ï¼  
</code></pre>
<p>âœ… <strong>ç±»å‹æç¤ºè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ</strong>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">def calculate_tax(income: int | float) -&gt; float:  
    return float(income) * 0.2 + 500  
</code></pre>
<p>ğŸ“Œ <strong>ä¼˜åŠ¿å¯¹æ¯”</strong>ï¼š</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>æŒ‡æ ‡</th>
<th>æ— ç±»å‹æç¤º</th>
<th>æœ‰ç±»å‹æç¤º</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>é”™è¯¯å‘ç°æ—¶æœº</td>
<td>è¿è¡Œæ—¶</td>
<td>ç¼–ç æ—¶</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ä»£ç å¯è¯»æ€§</td>
<td>ä½</td>
<td>è‡ªæ–‡æ¡£åŒ–</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>é‡æ„å®‰å…¨æ€§</td>
<td>é«˜é£é™©</td>
<td>IDEä¿éšœ</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p><strong>1.2 ç±»å‹ç”Ÿæ€ç³»ç»Ÿå…¨æ™¯å›¾</strong></p>
<div class="mermaid">graph LR  
A[Pythonæ ¸å¿ƒç±»å‹] --&gt; B[typingæ¨¡å—]  
B --&gt; C[Pydanticæ¨¡å‹]  
C --&gt; D[FastAPIé›†æˆ]  
D --&gt; E[è‡ªåŠ¨APIæ–‡æ¡£]  
B --&gt; F[Mypyé™æ€æ£€æŸ¥]  
F --&gt; G[CI/CDæµæ°´çº¿]  
</div><hr>
<h4 id="-ç¬¬äºŒç« ç±»å‹è¯­æ³•ç²¾è¦ä»é’é“œåˆ°ç‹è€…">ğŸ›  ç¬¬äºŒç« ï¼šç±»å‹è¯­æ³•ç²¾è¦â€”â€”ä»é’é“œåˆ°ç‹è€…</h4>
<p><strong>2.1 åŸºç¡€ç±»å‹ä¸‰é˜¶è®­ç»ƒ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python"># é’é“œï¼šç®€å•æ³¨è§£  
def greet(name: str) -&gt; str:  
    return f"Hello {name}"

# ç™½é“¶ï¼šè”åˆç±»å‹ä¸å¯é€‰å‚æ•°  
from typing import Union, Optional  
def parse_input(value: Union[int, str]) -&gt; Optional[float]:  
    try:  
        return float(value)  
    except ValueError:  
        return None  

# ç‹è€…ï¼šç±»å‹åˆ«åä¸å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°  
from typing import TypeAlias, Callable  
Vector = TypeAlias("Vector", list[float])  
OnSuccess = Callable[[Vector], None]  
def process_data(data: Vector, callback: OnSuccess) -&gt; None:  
    # ...å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘...  
    callback(normalized_data)  
</code></pre>
<p><strong>2.2 æ³›å‹ç¼–ç¨‹æ·±åº¦è§£æ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from typing import Generic, TypeVar, Iterable  
T = TypeVar('T', bound=Comparable)  

class PriorityQueue(Generic[T]):  
    def __init__(self, items: Iterable[T]) -&gt; None:  
        self._items = sorted(items)  

    def pop(self) -&gt; T:  
        return self._items.pop(0)  

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹  
pq_int = PriorityQueue([5, 2, 8])  
pq_str = PriorityQueue(["apple", "banana"])  # è‡ªåŠ¨ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼  
</code></pre>
<p>ğŸ” <strong>è®¾è®¡åŸç†</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>é€šè¿‡<code>TypeVar</code>å®šä¹‰ç±»å‹å˜é‡</li>
<li><code>bound</code>å‚æ•°çº¦æŸå…è®¸çš„ç±»å‹èŒƒå›´</li>
<li>å®ç°é€šç”¨æ•°æ®ç»“æ„çš„ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h4 id="-ç¬¬ä¸‰ç« åµŒå¥—ç±»å‹ä¸é¢†åŸŸå»ºæ¨¡">ğŸ§© ç¬¬ä¸‰ç« ï¼šåµŒå¥—ç±»å‹ä¸é¢†åŸŸå»ºæ¨¡</h4>
<p><strong>3.1 å¤æ‚æ•°æ®ç»“æ„å»ºæ¨¡</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from typing import TypedDict, Literal  
from datetime import datetime  

class GeoPoint(TypedDict):  
    lat: float  
    lng: float  
    precision: Literal["low", "medium", "high"]  

class UserActivity(TypedDict):  
    user_id: int  
    locations: list[GeoPoint]  
    last_active: datetime  

def analyze_activity(activity: UserActivity) -&gt; dict[str, int]:  
    # å®ç°åˆ†æé€»è¾‘...  
</code></pre>
<p>ğŸ“Š <strong>ç±»å‹å¯è§†åŒ–</strong>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{  
  "user_id": 123,  
  "locations": [  
    {"lat": 40.7128, "lng": -74.0060, "precision": "high"},  
    // ...æ›´å¤šåæ ‡ç‚¹  
  ],  
  "last_active": "2023-08-20T14:30:00"  
}  
</code></pre>
<p><strong>3.2 ä¸Pydanticçš„åŒ–å­¦ååº”</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from pydantic import BaseModel, conint, EmailStr  
from typing import Annotated  

class Address(BaseModel):  
    street: str  
    city: str  
    zip_code: Annotated[str, Field(pattern=r"^\d{6}$")]  

class UserProfile(BaseModel):  
    name: str  
    age: conint(gt=0)  
    email: EmailStr  
    addresses: list[Address]  
</code></pre>
<p>âœ… <strong>éªŒè¯è¿‡ç¨‹</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬æ¢è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®ç±»å‹</li>
<li>é€’å½’éªŒè¯åµŒå¥—æ¨¡å‹</li>
<li>ç”ŸæˆJSON Schemaæ–‡æ¡£</li>
</ol>
<hr>
<h4 id="-ç¬¬å››ç« ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨é˜²å¾¡ä»sqlæ³¨å…¥åˆ°æ•°æ®æ±¡æŸ“">ğŸ›¡ ç¬¬å››ç« ï¼šç±»å‹å®‰å…¨é˜²å¾¡â€”â€”ä»SQLæ³¨å…¥åˆ°æ•°æ®æ±¡æŸ“</h4>
<p><strong>4.1 å‚æ•°åŒ–æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç±»å‹å±éšœ</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from typing import Annotated  
from fastapi import Query  

@app.get("/search")  
def safe_search(  
    keyword: Annotated[str, Query(min_length=2)]  
) -&gt; list[Product]:  
    # æ­£ç¡®åšæ³•  
    query = "SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE :name"  
    params = {"name": f"%{keyword}%"}  
    results = db.execute(query, params)  
    return parse_products(results)  
</code></pre>
<p>âŒ <strong>å±é™©å†™æ³•</strong>ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">def unsafe_search(keyword: str):  
    # SQLæ³¨å…¥æ¼æ´ï¼  
    db.execute(f"SELECT * FROM products WHERE name = '{keyword}'")  
</code></pre>
<p><strong>4.2 è¯¾åå®æˆ˜ä»»åŠ¡</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>å°†ä»¥ä¸‹å±é™©ä»£ç æ”¹é€ ä¸ºç±»å‹å®‰å…¨ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š<pre><code class="language-python">def user_login(username: str, raw_password: str):  
    query = f"SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='{username}' AND password='{raw_password}'"  
    return db.execute(query)  
</code></pre>
</li>
<li>ä½¿ç”¨Pydanticæ¨¡å‹éªŒè¯å¯†ç å¤æ‚åº¦</li>
</ol>
<hr>
<h4 id="-ç¬¬äº”ç« é”™è¯¯è¯Šç–—å®¤ä»æŠ¥é”™åˆ°ç²¾é€š">ğŸš¨ ç¬¬äº”ç« ï¼šé”™è¯¯è¯Šç–—å®¤â€”â€”ä»æŠ¥é”™åˆ°ç²¾é€š</h4>
<p><strong>5.1 422 Validation Errorå…¨è§£</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python"># é”™è¯¯è§¦å‘åœºæ™¯  
@app.post("/users")  
def create_user(user: UserProfile):  
    ...  

# å‘é€éæ³•è¯·æ±‚ä½“  
{  
  "name": "Alice",  
  "age": -5,  
  "email": "invalid-email",  
  "addresses": [{"street": "Main St", "city": "NYC"}]  
}  
</code></pre>
<p>ğŸ”§ <strong>æ’æŸ¥æ­¥éª¤</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ol>
<li>æŸ¥çœ‹Swaggeræ–‡æ¡£éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™</li>
<li>ä½¿ç”¨<code>try: user = UserProfile(**data)</code>æ•è·å¼‚å¸¸</li>
<li>æ£€æŸ¥é”™è¯¯è¯¦æƒ…ä¸­çš„<code>loc</code>å’Œ<code>msg</code>å­—æ®µ</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>5.2 Mypyé”™è¯¯ä»£ç </strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>é”™è¯¯ä»£ç </th>
<th>å«ä¹‰</th>
<th>ä¿®å¤ç¤ºä¾‹</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>error: Missing return statement</td>
<td>å‡½æ•°ç¼ºå°‘è¿”å›è¯­å¥</td>
<td>æ·»åŠ <code>return</code>æˆ–å£°æ˜<code>-&gt; None</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>error: Incompatible types in assignment</td>
<td>ç±»å‹ä¸åŒ¹é…</td>
<td>æ£€æŸ¥å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="ç»“è¯­">ç»“è¯­</h3>
<p>ç°åœ¨ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥å°†ä»»æ„Pythonä»£ç å‡çº§ä¸ºç±»å‹å®‰å…¨çš„å·¥ä¸šçº§å®ç°ã€‚è®°ä½ï¼šä¼˜ç§€çš„å¼€å‘è€…ä¸æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šçŠ¯é”™ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯é€šè¿‡å·¥å…·è®©é”™è¯¯æ— å¤„éå½¢ï¼</p>
<p>ä½™ä¸‹æ–‡ç« å†…å®¹è¯·ç‚¹å‡»è·³è½¬è‡³ ä¸ªäººåšå®¢é¡µé¢ æˆ–è€… æ‰«ç å…³æ³¨æˆ–è€…å¾®ä¿¡æœä¸€æœï¼š<code>ç¼–ç¨‹æ™ºåŸŸ å‰ç«¯è‡³å…¨æ ˆäº¤æµä¸æˆé•¿</code>ï¼Œé˜…è¯»å®Œæ•´çš„æ–‡ç« ï¼š<a href="https://blog.cmdragon.cn/posts/8f8db75c315d/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Pythonç±»å‹æç¤ºå®Œå…¨æŒ‡å—ï¼šç”¨ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨é‡æ„ä½ çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œæå‡10å€å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ | cmdragon's Blog</a></p>
